scripts.dev: concurrently -n case,auth -c blue,green "npm run dev --workspace=apps/case-service" "npm run dev --workspace=apps/auth-service"
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=apps/case-service && npm run build --workspace=apps/auth-service
scripts.start: npm run start --workspace=apps/case-service && npm run start --workspace=apps/auth-service
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=apps/case-service && npm run lint --workspace=apps/auth-service
scripts.i-all: npm install && npm install --workspace=apps/case-service && npm install --workspace=apps/auth-service
